name: ABC: Audioreactive Beat Circle
description:
Audio-reactive gameplay

Audio-reactive arcade game where players goal is to avoid being hit by abstract shapes. The shapes move slower or faster depending on the music.

Chill or Compete

Play it as a casual chilling game while listening to music. Or play it as a hardcore gamer trying to beat records. The difficulty scales harder the more successful you are in the game.

Buy DLC

Buy DLC to enable audio reactivity while listening to your own music, to get more levels and to play the game with up to 6 players.
